        changeDevice

        public Response changeDevice(String deviceId, String resource, String state)

        Change the state of a device's resource.

        Parameters:
        deviceId - - The device's id.
        resource - - The resource name to change the state.
        state - - The new state.
        Returns:
        A Response: 200 if state is changed, 500 otherwise.

      • addColorToFieldValues

        addColorToFieldValues

        public List<String> addColorToFieldValues(String deviceId, String deviceType ,List<String> values)

        Add the color values to a field for a device.

        Parameters:
        deviceId - - The device's id
        deviceType - - The device's type.
        values - - the color values (hue, saturation, kelvin).
        Returns:
        A list of the color component (hue, saturation, kelvin) in String format.
